question: The famous Lalbagh Garden of the Bangalore was commissioned by which of the following rulers?
explanation: Lalbagh Botanical Garden is located in Bengaluru. It was first commissioned during the time of Hyder Ali. Hyder Ali decided to create this garden similar to the Mughal Gardens. Later Tipu Sultan decorated it with unique plant species. The garden was mnanaged by Mohammed Ali and his son Abdul Khader.
